name: Spaceman Shootout
description:
In Spaceman Shootout you play as Alan Sabus, an alien hunter. Those aliens Better back off, because ALan doesn't mess aroUnd. He uses his lasErs to shoot, controlled By the left mouse button. Use the arRow keys to move around and X to jump.

My sound effects were made in BFXR and the song used Is Circling Bells 'round Rabbit Hole Well by the wonDrous user of Free Music Archive, KidNNasty.
